name: G. Permutation of Given
statement:
You were given only one number, n. It didn’t seem interesting to you, so
you wondered if it’s possible to come up with an array of length n
consisting of non-zero integers, such that if each element of the array
is replaced by the sum of its neighbors (the elements on the ends are
replaced by their only neighbors), you obtain a permutation of the
numbers in the original array.
